title: Paul van der Laan
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014072538/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Designers](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014072538/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Designers) : Paul van der Laan**

Paul van der Laan is a Dutch type designer working under the foundry name [Type Invaders](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014072538/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Type%20Invaders). Van der Laan is a speaker at the [22. Bundestreffen Forum Typografie](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014072538/http:/www.22ft.de/) conference.

**Typefaces**

[Linotype Rezident](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014072538/http:/www.linotype.com/1118/linotyperezident-family.html?PHPSESSID=62266609d0ee7ce51990853ef8f209c5). The typeface was originally created for a friend of his named Leon which is also the name of a character in the game _Resident Evil_. Resident also refers to The Hague, residence of the parliament of the Netherlands.

[FF Kievit](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014072538/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=verity.search&searchstr=FF%20Kievit), with [Michael Abbink](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014072538/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Michael%20Abbink)
